name: Shugur Relay
short_description: High-performance nostr relay with distributed database.
description: High-performance nostr relay with distributed database. Shugur Relay is a self-hosted application focused on network, social, database, storage. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose. It supports a wide range of use cases for homelabs and self-hosted infrastructure.
usecases: Self-host Shugur Relay on your home server to high-performance nostr relay with distributed database without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Shugur Relay to manage your network workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
